Package Objects

Class Seat

Object
Seat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Seat extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a Seat within a Cinema.
Since:
2022-11-11
Version:
1.0
Author:
Chay Hui Xiang

  • Field Details

    • id

      private String id
      Represents the ID of the Seat. (Eg. A1, A2).

    • movieGoer

      private MovieGoer movieGoer
      MovieGoer for whom the Seat is assigned to. Set to null if the Seat is not assigned to anybody.

    • seatType

      private SeatType seatType
      Type of the Seat. (ie. REGULAR, COUPLE, ELITE, ULTIMA).

  • Constructor Details

    • Seat

      public Seat(String id, SeatType seatType)
      Creates a new Seat to be added to the layout of the Cinema, with the given id and seatType.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the Seat. (Eg. A1, A2).
      seatType - Type of the Seat. (ie. REGULAR, COUPLE, ELITE, ULTIMA).

  • Method Details

    • getMovieGoer

      public MovieGoer getMovieGoer()
      Retrieves the MovieGoer for whom this seat is assigned to. Returns null if the seat is not assigned to anyone.
      Returns:
      this Seat's assigned MovieGoer.

    • getId

      public String getId()
      Retrieves the ID of this Seat.
      Returns:
      this Seat's ID.

    • assignSeat

      public void assignSeat(MovieGoer movieGoer)
      Assigns this Seat to a particular MovieGoer
      Parameters:
      movieGoer - MovieGoer to assign this Seat to.

    • unassignSeat

      public void unassignSeat()
      Unassigns this Seat from its original MovieGoer

    • getSeatType

      public SeatType getSeatType()
      Retrieves the seatType of this Seat.
      Returns:
      this Seat's seatType

    • printSeat

      public void printSeat()
      Prints this Seat, depending on the avaiability of the seat, and the seatType. Seat Legend: REGULAR: [ ][ ] | [X][X] COUPLE: [ ] | [X X] ELITE: { }{ } | {X}{X} ULTIMA: { } | {X X}

    • isAvailable

      public boolean isAvailable()
      Checks whether this Seat is available.
      Returns:
      the availability status of the seat.
